sub_title:
Translator, editor, copywriter and conference speaker:
Providing written and spoken words in English, Spanish and Dutch
summary:
Having lived in four countries I know government, habits and rituals depend on the history of the people in the area. I am aware of differences in culture including the way people do business. My globe-trotting has contributed to my worldwide network, where I can, more often than not, find people who have the information and skills I am looking for. That, added to my language and computer skills, assures my customers get the high-quality services they deserve!

I love new challenges, ideas and information, which is why I enjoy my work, every day!

Among translators I am known as the Hugging Translator. This is because I believe in the personal touch. I hug my projects, look at projects from various perspectives and keep close to both my customers and the freelance colleagues I work with.

Having a small company means I can pick and choose the projects I work on and the colleagues I work with...

Write outside the box creates catchy content for websites, newsletters and more.', 'image': None}, {'url': None, 'title': 'AzTech Solutions_Donald Duck_2016.ppsx', 'description': 'One may wonder why a professional translator presents on the translations of the Donald Duck stories... It is a wonderful example of the difference an erudite translation can have on the product. In Germany, the Netherlands and a few other countries everyone reads the magazine. In the USA where Donald was born the magazine is no longer printed. The difference is based on the quality of the texts, on the knowledge of the translator, of the writers.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C562DAQF5AJ4aV81T2A/profile-treasury-document-cover-images_1920/0/1584167977121?e=1692882000&v=beta&t=bGygI_sy0dZEeF42S-F32rkyfl9q8mOxFfC6aptWJmc'}, {'url': None, 'title': 'AzTech Solutions_File preparation and conversion_2016.ppsx', 'description': 'This presentation is about converting non-editable PDF files to Word for CAT tool processing. For every step I include options for manual, semi-automated and automated processing.

I prepared this presentation for the Israel Translators Association conference in Jerusalem and also presented on this topic at TriKonf 2015 in Freiburg, Germany.

Please contact me if you have any questions.', 'image': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C562DAQEB7AxzDkfqqw/profile-treasury-document-cover-images_1920/0/1584344381959?e=1692882000&v=beta&t=TVnD_AyGhOieE2c6elxfioehyIaJ15gOGUHdHItpbj0'}]
